author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Tim Anderson's patch that provides extend and super tags to the dynamic tag definitions.
This provides tag-based OO programming which is kinda wacky and cool :-).
This introduces the possibility of merging template based and OO based scripting mechanisms together

author: jstrachan
msg: Added some extra tracing we can use if exceptions are being caught and eaten by some higher level tool

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the copyright year to indicate when Jelly actually came to be, which was 2002.
Thanks for bringing this up Stefan.

author: jstrachan
msg: Added the new Threads library created by Jason Horman which allows simple and complex threading to be used inside a Jelly script.
This is especially useful for evaluating different Jelly scripts in parallel and then joining them back together.

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied up the exception handling somewhat
